about_the_game:
Not for the faint of heart, the Blue Servers Skins DLC pack contains two eye-catching weapon skins for those who want to stand out from the crowd… or even a bush.
Featuring both the Blue Servers and Warning Stripes weapon skins, these are usable across all gun models in the game. Use at your own peril.

Featuring:
  • Blue Servers Gun Skin
  • Warning Stripes Gun skin
Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
